> When I was a young man,              
>                 
> I had liberty, but I did not see it.                 
>                   
> I had time, but I did not know it.                   
>                    
> And I had love, but I did not feel it.                   
>                    
> Many decades would pass before I understood the meaning of all three.                   
>                    
> And now, the twilight of my life, misunderstanding has past into contentment.                   
>                    
> Love, liberty, and time: once was so disposable, are the fuels that drive me forward.                   
>                    
> And love, most especially, mia caro.                   
>                     
> For you, our children, our brothers and sisters.                   
>                    
> And for the vast and wonderful world that gives us lives and keeps us guessing,                   
>                    
> endless affectionmio Sofia,                   
>                     
> Forever yours, Ezio Auditore

##****     
OAuthstackoverflowOAuth1.0aOAuth2
> OAuth 1.0aOne Leg ->Two Leg -> Three Legged            
> OAuth 2:Two Leg ->Three Legged (Refresh Token)

legOAuth5

<!--more-->
##**OAuth1.0a**
**2.1 OAuth 1.0a (One Leg)**

1.            
	* oauth_token Empty String             
	* oauth_consumer_key                  
	* oauth_timestamp                   
	* oauth_nonce                    
	* oauth_signature                  
	* oauth_signature_method              
	* oauth_version Optional                  
2.                  
3.                 

**2.2 OAuth 1.0a (Two Legs)**

1.  Request Token                 
	* oauth_consumer_key                          
	* oauth_timestamp                     
	* oauth_nonce                        
	* oauth_signature                  
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version Optional                      
2. Request Token                   
	* oauth_token                    
	* oauth_token_secret                  
	* Additional Parameters / Arguments                   
3. Request TokenAccess Token                      
	* oauth_token Request Token                    
	* oauth_consumer_key                   
	* oauth_nonce                 
	* oauth_signature                      
	* oauth_signature_method                    
	* oauth_version                           
4. Access TokenToken Secret    
5. Access TokenToken Secret

**2.3 OAuth 1.0a (Three Legged)**

1.  Request Token                
	* oauth_consumer_key                       
	* oauth_timestamp                       
	* oauth_nonce                       
	* oauth_signature                       
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version Optional                       
2. Request Token                       
	* oauth_token                       
	* oauth_token_secret                       
	* oauth_callback_confirmed                       
	*  Additional Parameters / Arguments                       
3. URL                       
	* oauth_token                       
4.                        
5.                        
6.                        
	* oauth_token                       
	* oauth_verifier                       
7. Request TokenAccess Token                       
	* oauth_token Request Token                       
	* oauth_consumer_key                       
	* oauth_nonce                       
	* oauth_signature                       
	* oauth_signature_method                       
	* oauth_version                       
	* oauth_verifier                       
8. Access TokenToken Secret                       
9. Access TokenToken Secret                       

##**OAuth2**         

** 3.1 OAuth 2 (Two Legged)**

3.1.1               

1.                    
	* grant_type = client_credentials                   
AuthorizationAuthorization: Basic Base64(client_id:client_secret) header                   
	* client_id                   
	* client_secret                   
2. Access Token                   
	* access_token                   
	* expires_in                   
	* token_type                   

3.1.2                

1.                                                 
	* response_type = token                      
	* redirect_uri This is a server-side Redirection URI hosted by the provider or yourself.                      
	* scope                      
	* state Optional                      
	* client_id                      
2.                       
	* username                      
	* password                      
3. access_tokenredirect_uri                      
4. redirect_uri                      
5. redirect_uriHTMLHTMLaccess_token                  

3.1.3                   

1.                    
	* username                   
	* password                   
2.                    
	* grant_type = password                   
	* username                   
	* password                   
urlgrant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password                   
Authorizationheader                   
	* client_id                   
	* client_secret                   
url                   
grant_type=password&username=my_username&password=my_password&client_id=random_string&client_secret=random_secret                   
3. Access Toke                   
	* access_token                   
	* expires_in                   
	* token_type                   

** 3.2 OAuth 2 (Three Legged) **

1.                     
	* client_id                    
	* redirect_uri                    
	* response_type                    
	* state Optional; Unique identifier to protect against CSRF                    
	* scope Optional; what data your application can access.                    
url                    
oauth_service/login/oauth/authorize?client_id=3MVG9lKcPoNINVB&redirect_uri=http://localhost/oauth/code_callback&scope=user                    
2.                     
3. redirect_url                     
	* code                    
	* state                    
4. codeAccess Token                    
	* client_id                    
	* client_secret                    
	* code                    
	* redirect_uri Optional;                    
	* grant_type = "authorization_code"                    
5. client_idclient_secretredirect_urlACCESS_TOKEN                    
	* access_token                    
	* expires_in                    
	* refresh_token                    
6. ACCESS_TOKENsessioncookie   

** 3.3 OAuth 2 (Refresh Token token) **

OAuth2Tokenrefresh_tokentoken    

1.                   
	* grant_type = "refresh_token"                      
	* scope Optional; Cannot have any new scopes not previously defined.                     
	* refresh_token                     
	* client_id                     
	* client_secret                     
2.                      
	* access_token                     
	* issued_at

**A**OAuth2OAuthOAuth1.0OAuth2.0                     
OAuth2.0TwitterAPIHMACOAuth2.0HTTPS                               
OAuth2.0                           
OAuth2.0OAuth1.0Twitter OAuth2.0                                     
OAuth2.0OAuth
                   
**Q**OAuth2stateCSRF                        
**A**state$state = md5(uniqid(rand(), TRUE));sessionsatate[OAuth2](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-threatmodel-00)[CSRF](http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-26#section-10.12)

##

####**1. **

``` bash
$ git clone https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia.git themes/yilia
```

####**2. **

hexo `_config.yml`  `theme: yilia`

####**3. **

``` bash
cd themes/yilia
git pull
```

#Kael-Qrcode 

> html5 canvas                   

[github here](https://github.com/litten/Kael-Qrcode)              
dotaKael Kael-Qrcode        

   
<!-- more -->
###  Usage:

**1**

**Demo Base - **

```js
	var kaelBase = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelBase.init(document.getElementById("qr-base"), "hello KaelQrcode");
```

**2**

           

**Demo Pic - **

            

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-pic.jpg)
```js
	var kaelPic = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelBase.init(document.getElementById("qr-pic"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		img: {
			src : "kael-ico.jpg",
			border: "#fff"
		}
	});
```
**Demo Sae - **        

           

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-sea.jpg)
```js
	var kaelSea = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelSea.init(document.getElementById("qr-sea"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: {
			'0': 'rgb(1, 158, 213)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(30, 169, 224)',
			'0.6': 'rgb(0, 120, 191)',
			'1': 'rgb(1, 119, 255)'
		},
		background: "#d3e3f0",
		type: "round"
	});
```

**Demo Iron - **     

            

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-iron.jpg)
```js
	var kaelIron = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelIron.init(document.getElementById("qr-iron"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: {
			'0': 'rgb(30, 30, 30)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(100, 100, 100)',
			'1': 'rgb(40, 40, 40)'
		},
		background: {
			'0': 'rgb(233, 233, 233)',
			'0.2': 'rgb(246, 246, 246)',
			'1': 'rgb(212, 212, 212)'
		},
		shadow: true
	});
```
**Demo Iron - **      

        

![demo](http://littendomo.sinaapp.com/kaer-qrcode/qrcode-point.jpg)
```js
	var kaelPoint = new KaelQrcode();
	kaelPoint.init(document.getElementById("qr-point"), {
		text : "hello KaelQrcode",
		size: 300,
		color: "#50528f",
		background: "e7e0cf",
		pointColor: "#ee256c",
		type: "round"
	});
```

###  Todo

1. 
2. 
3. 
4.

Page._content: ![](/assets/blogImg/mediator1.jpg) > ABBA ##**** **** ##**** [demo](/assets/demo/mediator/demo.html) ##**demo coffeescript50** Playerpointsnameprototypeplaymediator ```coffeescript Player = (name)-> @points = 0 @name = name Player::play = -> @points++ mediator.played() ``` scoreboardMVCV(view)updatescoremediator(score)(scoreboard) ```coffeescript scoreboard = element: document.getElementById "results" update:(score)-> msg = '' for key,value of score if score.hasOwnProperty key msg = msg+"#{key}:#{value}" @element.innerHTML = msg diff = score.Home - score.Guest if diff > 15 alert "Home Win!" location.reload(); else if diff <-15 alert "Guest Win!" location.reload(); else document.getElementById('barGuest').style.width = 150 + (diff*10) + 'px' ``` mediatorsetupHomeGuestPlayer modelplayermediatorplayedscorescorescoreboardkeypress ```coffeescript mediator = players:{} setup:-> players = @players players.home = new Player 'Home' players.guest = new Player 'Guest' played:-> players = @players score = Home: players.home.points Guest:players.guest.points scoreboard.update score keypress:(e)-> e = e|| window.event keycode = e.which if keycode is 102 mediator.players.home.play() return if keycode is 106 mediator.players.guest.play() return ``` ```coffeescript mediator.setup() window.onkeypress = mediator.keypress ``` ##**** colleaguemediatorcolleaguemediatormediatorcolleague
Page.raw: --- layout: post title: "(mediator)" date: 2013-01-02 12:36 comments: true tags: - coffeescript - --- ![](/assets/blogImg/mediator1.jpg) > ABBA ##**** **** ##**** [demo](/assets/demo/mediator/demo.html) ##**demo coffeescript50** Playerpointsnameprototypeplaymediator ```coffeescript Player = (name)-> @points = 0 @name = name Player::play = -> @points++ mediator.played() ``` scoreboardMVCV(view)updatescoremediator(score)(scoreboard) ```coffeescript scoreboard = element: document.getElementById "results" update:(score)-> msg = '' for key,value of score if score.hasOwnProperty key msg = msg+"#{key}:#{value}" @element.innerHTML = msg diff = score.Home - score.Guest if diff > 15 alert "Home Win!" location.reload(); else if diff <-15 alert "Guest Win!" location.reload(); else document.getElementById('barGuest').style.width = 150 + (diff*10) + 'px' ``` mediatorsetupHomeGuestPlayer modelplayermediatorplayedscorescorescoreboardkeypress ```coffeescript mediator = players:{} setup:-> players = @players players.home = new Player 'Home' players.guest = new Player 'Guest' played:-> players = @players score = Home: players.home.points Guest:players.guest.points scoreboard.update score keypress:(e)-> e = e|| window.event keycode = e.which if keycode is 102 mediator.players.home.play() return if keycode is 106 mediator.players.guest.play() return ``` ```coffeescript mediator.setup() window.onkeypress = mediator.keypress ``` ##**** colleaguemediatorcolleaguemediatormediatorcolleague

Nginx           
 `default_server` IP `listen port` Web 

[ngx_http_proxy_module](http://nginx.org/en/docs/http/ngx_http_proxy_module.html)
```
 server {
    listen  80 default_server;
    server_name  localhost;
    resolver 8.8.8.8;
    location / {
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-Ip $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $remote_addr;
        proxy_pass http://$host;
    }
}

server {
    listen  80;
    server_name  ke.qq.com;
    location / {
        proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-Ip $remote_addr;
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $remote_addr;
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:9091/;
    }
}
```

Page.title: web worker
Page.content:
jssetTimeout()setInterval()XMLHttpRequest
John ResigHow JavaScript Timers WorkHTML5web worker

###worker
web workerapihtml5 postmessagenode.jssocket.io

  1. postMessage(data)
  2. onmessage(event)

web worker:

  1. : self.close()
  2. : worker.terminate()

w3cweb workerworker(Dedicated Worker)worker(Shared Worker)

###worker
web workerworker.js

var worker = new Worker("worker.js");

worker

worker.onmessage = function (event) {
    alert(event.data);
};

worker.js 

postMessage('helloimweb');

web workerjson

var worker = new Worker("worker.js");
worker.onmessage = function (event) {
    document.getElementById("result").innerHTML=event.data;
};

function start(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'start', 'msg': 'start'});
}

function pause(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'pause', 'msg': 'pause'});
}

function stop(){
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'stop', 'msg': 'stop'});
}

function msg(){
    worker.postMessage({'msg': 'hello imweb'});
}

worker.js

self.onmessage = function (e) {
    var data = e.data;
      switch (data.cmd) {
    case 'start':
        taskStart(); //
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          break;
    case 'pause':
        taskPause();
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          break;
    case 'stop':
          postMessage('WORKER DO: ' + data.msg);
          self.close(); //web worker
          break;
    default:
          postMessage('MESSAGE: ' + data.msg);
      };
};

wokertaskStart()web workerUI

###worker
workerworker,

var worker = new SharedWorker('shared-worker.js');
worker.port.onmessage = function(e) {
    msg = 'Someone just said "' + e.data.message + '". That is message number ' + e.data.counter;
    console.log(msg);
};
worker.port.postMessage('hello shared worker!');

shared-worker.js: 

var counter = 0;
var connections = [];
onconnect = function(eConn) {
       var port = eConn.ports[0]; // port

   //
   port.onmessage = function(eMsg) { 
       counter++;
       for (var i=0; i < connections.length; i++) {
           connections[i].postMessage({
               message: eMsg.data,
               counter: counter
           });
       }
   }
   port.start();
   connections.push(port);

Someone just said Hello shared worker! This is message number 1
message number 2

###
web workerworkerthisselfworker

  1. navigator appName, appVersion, platform, userAgent
  2. location
  3. XMLHttpRequest
  4. setTimeout(), setInterval(), clearTimeout()clearInterval()

  1. DOM()
  2. window
  3. document
  4. parent

workerworker.onerrorerror

  1. filename:
  2. lineno:

worker.onerror = function(e) {
    console.log(e.filename+"ERROR on line"+e.lineno+",msg:"+e.message);
}

###web worker
web workercanvasjsonpscriptweb workerjsonpworker

function tryJsonp(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var jsonp=document.createElement("script");  
    jsonp.type="text/javascript";  
    jsonp.src="worker.js?_="+d;  
    document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(jsonp);
    jsonp.onload = jsonp.onreadystatechange = function(){  
           if(!this.readyState||this.readyState=='loaded'||this.readyState=='complete'){  
               console.log('jsonp: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
        }  
    }
}
function tryWorker(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var worker = new Worker("worker.js");
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'start', 'msg': 'start'});
    worker.onmessage = function (event) {
        console.log('web worker: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
    };
}

function tryJsonp(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var jsonp=document.createElement("script");  
    jsonp.type="text/javascript";  
    jsonp.src="worker.js?_="+d;  
    document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(jsonp);
    jsonp.onload = jsonp.onreadystatechange = function(){  
           if(!this.readyState||this.readyState=='loaded'||this.readyState=='complete'){  
               console.log('jsonp: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
        }  
    }
}
function tryWorker(){
    var d = (new Date()).valueOf();
    var worker = new Worker("worker.js");
    worker.postMessage({'cmd': 'start', 'msg': 'start'});
    worker.onmessage = function (event) {
        console.log('web worker: '+ ((new Date()).valueOf() - d));
    };
}
